foreignObject.div: A crucial, often overlooked, aspect of RAG evaluation is assessing hallucination *in context*. Simply measuring factual accuracy against a gold standard isn't sufficient; evaluate how the hallucination impacts downstream reasoning or the overall agent's decision-making. Ignoring this contextual impact can mask serious flaws in a seemingly accurate retrieval-augmentation system. Pitfalls in agent orchestration often stem from inadequate error handling and lack of robust fallback mechanisms when a sub-agent fails.
